trans-unit.source: Represents an ordered list of <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 代表已排序的清單的<xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] A TimerEventSubscriptionCollection represents the queue of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription> objects associated with a workflow instance and provides methods to manage this queue.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]TimerEventSubscriptionCollection 代表的佇列<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription>與工作流程相關聯的物件執行個體，並提供方法來管理此佇列。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription>

trans-unit.source: Subscriptions are ordered in the queue based on their <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A> values; those with smaller <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A> values are positioned before those with larger <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A> values.
trans-unit.target: 訂用帳戶為基礎的佇列中排序其<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A>值，而具有較小<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A>之前位於值較大<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A>值。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use the methods provided by this class to manage the collection of active timer event subscriptions exposed by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.TimerCollectionProperty> for each workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個類別所提供的方法來管理所公開的使用中計時器事件訂閱集合<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.TimerCollectionProperty>每個工作流程執行個體。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.TimerCollectionProperty>

trans-unit.source: You can use <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.Add%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.Remove%2A> to add or remove subscriptions from the timer queue.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.Add%2A>或<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.Remove%2A>新增或移除從計時器佇列的訂用帳戶。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.Remove%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: Whenever the first element in the timer queue changes, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService> is called to cancel the timer event that was previously at the beginning of the queue and schedule the new timer event.
trans-unit.target: 每當計時器佇列中的第一個項目變更時，<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService>呼叫以取消之前位於佇列開頭的計時器事件和排程新的計時器事件。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService>

trans-unit.source: Adds a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription"></xref> to the timer queue.
trans-unit.target: 新增<xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription"></xref>至計時器佇列。

trans-unit.source: Adds the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription> to the timer queue.
trans-unit.target: 新增<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription>至計時器佇列。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription>

trans-unit.source: Subscriptions in the queue are positioned based on their <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A?displayProperty=fullName> values; those with smaller values are positioned in front of those with larger values.
trans-unit.target: 在佇列中的訂閱會放置根據其<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A?displayProperty=fullName>值; 值較小會放置在值較大的前面。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If the new subscription is added at the beginning of the queue, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService.Cancel%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is called to cancel the timer event that was previously at the beginning of the queue and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService.Schedule%28System.Threading.WaitCallback%2CSystem.Guid%2CSystem.DateTime%2CSystem.Guid%29?displayProperty=fullName> is called to schedule the new timer event.
trans-unit.target: 如果佇列的開頭加入新的訂用帳戶<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService.Cancel%2A?displayProperty=fullName>呼叫以取消之前位於佇列開頭的計時器事件和<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService.Schedule%28System.Threading.WaitCallback%2CSystem.Guid%2CSystem.DateTime%2CSystem.Guid%29?displayProperty=fullName>呼叫以排定新的計時器事件。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService.Schedule%28System.Threading.WaitCallback%2CSystem.Guid%2CSystem.DateTime%2CSystem.Guid%29?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService.Cancel%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Add locks the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection> before adding the new subscription and is, therefore, thread safe.
trans-unit.target: 新增鎖定<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection>之前加入新的訂用帳戶，因此具備執行緒安全。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription"></xref> to add to the timer queue.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription"> </xref>新增至計時器佇列。

trans-unit.source: item is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: item為 null 參考 ( 在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: Copies the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection"></xref> elements to an existing one-dimensional <xref:System.Array>, starting at the specified array index.
trans-unit.target: 複製<xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection"></xref>項目至現有一維<xref:System.Array>、 指定的陣列索引處開始。</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: CopyTo is thread safe.
trans-unit.target: CopyTo 具備執行緒安全。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <xref:System.Array> that is the destination of the elements copied from the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 一維<xref:System.Array>也就是從複製之元素的目的地<xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection"> </xref>。</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array> must have zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array>必須有以零為起始的索引。</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in `array` at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: 中以零為起始的索引`array`由此開始複製。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription"></xref> objects in the timer queue.
trans-unit.target: 取得數目<xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription"></xref>計時器佇列中的物件。

trans-unit.source: The number of <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription"></xref> objects in the queue.
trans-unit.target: 數目<xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription"></xref>佇列中的物件。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回逐一查看的列舉值<xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Access to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection> is synchronized; however, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: 若要存取<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection>同步處理; 不過，列舉集合在本質上並非安全執行緒的程序。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection>

trans-unit.source: An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 只要集合維持不變，列舉程式就持續有效。

trans-unit.source: If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and its behavior is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 如果對集合進行變更，例如加入、 修改或刪除元素，列舉程式會永久失效，且其行為未定義。

trans-unit.source: The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: 列舉程式沒有集合的獨佔存取因此，列舉集合在本質上並非安全執行緒的程序。

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection> during the entire enumeration by using <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.SyncRoot%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection>使用<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.SyncRoot%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.SyncRoot%2A>在整個列舉期間</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection>鎖定

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> for the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> for the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection"></xref>.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the access to the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection"></xref> is synchronized (thread safe).
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否要存取<xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection"></xref>是同步 （安全執行緒）。

trans-unit.source: Access to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection> is synchronized; however, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: 若要存取<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection>同步處理; 不過，列舉集合在本質上並非安全執行緒的程序。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection>

trans-unit.source: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 即使集合經過同步化，其他的執行緒仍可修改該集合，使列舉值擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.
trans-unit.target: 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以在整個列舉過程中鎖定集合，或攔截由其他執行緒的變更所造成的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.SyncRoot%2A> returns an object, which can be used to synchronize access to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.SyncRoot%2A>傳回的物件，可用來同步處理存取具備<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.SyncRoot%2A>

trans-unit.source: Always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> indicating that access to the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection"></xref> is synchronized (thread safe).
trans-unit.target: 一律傳回<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>指出存取<xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection"></xref>是同步 （安全執行緒）。

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription"></xref> at the beginning of the timer queue without removing it.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription"></xref>計時器佇列，而不移除它的開頭。

trans-unit.source: Peek is thread safe.
trans-unit.target: 查看具備執行緒安全。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription"></xref> at the beginning of the timer queue or a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic) if the timer queue is empty.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription"> </xref>開頭的計時器佇列則為 null 參考 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref>在 Visual Basic 中) 如果計時器佇列是空的。

trans-unit.source: Removes the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription"></xref> that has the specified subscription id from the timer queue.
trans-unit.target: 移除<xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription"></xref>具有指定的訂閱識別碼，從計時器佇列。

trans-unit.source: Removes the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription> with the specified subscription id from the timer queue.
trans-unit.target: 移除<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription>從計時器佇列指定的訂用帳戶識別碼。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription>

trans-unit.source: Subscriptions in the queue are positioned based on their <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A?displayProperty=fullName> values; those with smaller values are positioned in front of those with larger values.
trans-unit.target: 在佇列中的訂閱會放置根據其<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A?displayProperty=fullName>值; 值較小會放置在值較大的前面。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If the subscription removed was the subscription at the beginning of the queue, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService.Cancel%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is called to cancel the timer event associated with this subscription and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService.Schedule%28System.Threading.WaitCallback%2CSystem.Guid%2CSystem.DateTime%2CSystem.Guid%29?displayProperty=fullName> is called to schedule a timer event for the subscription that is now at the beginning of the queue.
trans-unit.target: 如果移除的訂閱已佇列的開頭訂閱<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService.Cancel%2A?displayProperty=fullName>呼叫以取消此訂用帳戶相關聯的計時器事件和<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService.Schedule%28System.Threading.WaitCallback%2CSystem.Guid%2CSystem.DateTime%2CSystem.Guid%29?displayProperty=fullName>呼叫以排定現在位於佇列開頭之訂閱的計時器事件。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService.Schedule%28System.Threading.WaitCallback%2CSystem.Guid%2CSystem.DateTime%2CSystem.Guid%29?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService.Cancel%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Remove is thread safe.
trans-unit.target: 移除具備執行緒安全。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Guid> of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription"></xref> to remove.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Guid>的<xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription"></xref>移除。</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: Removes the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription"></xref> from the timer queue.
trans-unit.target: 移除<xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription"></xref>從計時器佇列。

trans-unit.source: Removes the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription> from the timer queue.
trans-unit.target: 移除<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription>從計時器佇列。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription>

trans-unit.source: Subscriptions in the queue are positioned based on their <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A?displayProperty=fullName> values; those with smaller values are positioned in front of those with larger values.
trans-unit.target: 在佇列中的訂閱會放置根據其<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A?displayProperty=fullName>值; 值較小會放置在值較大的前面。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If the subscription removed was the subscription at the beginning of the queue, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService.Cancel%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is called to cancel the timer event associated with this subscription and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService.Schedule%28System.Threading.WaitCallback%2CSystem.Guid%2CSystem.DateTime%2CSystem.Guid%29?displayProperty=fullName> is called to schedule a timer event for the subscription that is now at the beginning of the queue.
trans-unit.target: 如果移除的訂閱已佇列的開頭訂閱<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService.Cancel%2A?displayProperty=fullName>呼叫以取消此訂用帳戶相關聯的計時器事件和<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService.Schedule%28System.Threading.WaitCallback%2CSystem.Guid%2CSystem.DateTime%2CSystem.Guid%29?displayProperty=fullName>呼叫以排定現在位於佇列開頭之訂閱的計時器事件。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService.Schedule%28System.Threading.WaitCallback%2CSystem.Guid%2CSystem.DateTime%2CSystem.Guid%29?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService.Cancel%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.Remove%28System.Guid%29> is thread safe.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.Remove%28System.Guid%29>具備執行緒安全。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.Remove%28System.Guid%29>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription"></xref> to remove from the timer queue.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription"> </xref>從計時器佇列中移除。

trans-unit.source: item is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: item為 null 參考 ( 在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得物件，可用來同步處理存取具備<xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: SyncRoot returns an object, which can be used to synchronize access to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Syncroot 同步則傳回的物件，可用來同步處理存取具備<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection>

trans-unit.source: Access to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection> is synchronized; however, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: 若要存取<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection>同步處理; 不過，列舉集合在本質上並非安全執行緒的程序。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection>

trans-unit.source: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 即使集合經過同步化，其他的執行緒仍可修改該集合，使列舉值擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection> during the entire enumeration by using SyncRoot or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.
trans-unit.target: 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以鎖定<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection>使用 syncroot 同步或攔截由其他執行緒的變更所造成的例外狀況在整個列舉過程。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection>

trans-unit.source: An object used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 用來同步存取的物件<xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Timer queue associated with a workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 工作流程執行個體相關聯的計時器佇列。

trans-unit.source: This queue contains time ordered <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription"></xref> objects for a workflow.
trans-unit.target: 此佇列包含依時間排序<xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription"></xref>工作流程的物件。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。
